post.body: I'm doing NOTHING. waiting for people to take my computer to my new cubicle. Been waiting 3 hours.
I agree. Current bond is kinda moody and I never clicked with the story of the last bond movie.
happy fish :D I like it! How was Bond Movie?
kinda like feeds for starters. Find other people's posts to follow for starts.
he he. now I'll bother you during work!!!
itching and twitching for the last 1 hour and 10 minutes to go by.
2 and 15 minutes till freedom! and then a 2 wk vacation. yeah!!!
grumpy that it's raining and listening to weird people on subway
not ready to walk into the rain and howling wind
sleepy...so sleepy...one more hour to go...
on my second cup of coffee for the day...and I rarely do this. Gosh when's 5 pm gona come?
I want to go hooooome!9 more minutes to go
this new cubicle is by the window. you'd think the slight draft will keep me awake, but no...I need cofee..
for those twitter nay sayers:facebook is blocked at work. Twittr is the only way I can update my status!
okay...I really have to go and clean now...
I'm so pissed. Can't deposit Gov Stimulous check because need Mike's signature too, and he's in um China till end of Jan.
Mike left for China today. No more nice cooking. Agreat opportunity to go on a diet.
I want a drink now!start my thanksgiving now!
my horoscope:supposedly I have lots of big things in transition. hmmm like I'm turning 30 with a pathetic deadend job?
I don't think the temperature went above freezing today. How insane is that? I'm so happy I didn't have to go outside!
Grossed out at the perve in the subway. Stop looking at me!
not sure where to get my haircut. I hate hair salons, always feel uncomfortable...
